description:
This Package contains several methods related to working with assemblies. Below is a brief description of the main methods and functionalities provided by this AssemblyHelper class:

1-GetAssembly() :
This method retrieves the Assembly instance of the code that calls it. 

2-GetAssembly(Type? type) :
The GetAssembly method is used to retrieve the assembly that contains a specified type.

3-GetAssembly(string assemblyName) :
The GetAssembly method is used to retrieve an assembly based on the provided assembly name.

4-GetAssembly(object? @object) :
Gets the Assembly associated with the specified object's type.

5-GetAssemblyName() :
This method retrieves the name of the loaded assembly.

6-GetAssemblyName(Assembly? assembly) :
This method retrieves the name of the provided loaded assembly.

7-GetAssemblyName(Type? type) :
This method retrieves the name of the assembly associated with the provided Type 

8-GetAssemblyName(object? @object) :
This method retrieves the name of the assembly associated with the provided object's type.

9-GetAssembliesName() :
This method retrieves the names of all assemblies in the current application .

10-GetAssemblyNameLength(string assemblyName) :
This method retrieves the length of the provided assembly name.

11-GetAssemblyNameLength(Type assemblyType) :
This method gets the length of the assembly name associated with the provided assembly type.

12-GetAssemblyNameLength(object @object) :
This method gets the length of the assembly name associated with the provided object's type.

13-GetAssemblyNameLength(Assembly assembly) :
This method gets the length of the assembly name associated with the provided assembly.

14-GetAllAssemblies() :
This method retrieves all the assemblies loaded in the current application domain or related to projects in the solution.

15-GetTypesByName(Assembly assembly, string typeName) :
This method gets the types from the provided assembly that have names containing the specified type name.

16-GetTypesByName(string typeName) :
This method gets the types from all loaded assemblies that have names containing the specified type name.

17-GetTypes() :
This method gets all types from all assemblies that are currently loaded in the application .

18-GetType(string typeName) :
This method gets the first type from all assemblies with the specified type name.
releaseNotes:
Add more methods
Add cache to improve performance
Add try-catch
Delete the GetConstructors method
Improved documentation
Corrected the names of some methods
title: Assembly Services Utility
